      • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractLoggableComponent

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericRemoteInvocationCommandService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GenericRemoteInvocationCommandServiceImpl

    public abstract class AbstractGenericRemoteInvocationCommandService
extends AbstractGenericRemoteInvocationService<RemoteInvocationCommand<?>,GenericRemoteInvocationCommandRequest,GenericRemoteInvocationCommandResponse,GenericRemoteInvocationCommandCallHandler>
implements GenericRemoteInvocationCommandService
    This is the abstract base implementation of GenericRemoteInvocationCommandService.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Detail

      • callCommands

        public GenericRemoteInvocationCommandResponse callCommands(GenericRemoteInvocationCommandRequest request)
        This method calls one or multiple RemoteInvocationCommands on the server. The implementation is typically generic and dispatches the commands to according services.
        Specified by:
        callCommands in interface GenericRemoteInvocationCommandService
        Parameters:
        request - is the GenericRemoteInvocationCommandRequest.
        Returns:
        the according GenericRemoteInvocationCommandResponse.
